publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure

description.value:
Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, dying, or dead while standing.

You fall like a mighty tree, dealing @Damage[7d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage to each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:10] originating from your square with a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC; on a critical failure, a medium or smaller creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until your body is removed.
